thread.title: Your first trade for Friday, April 13

author: Nia Warfield
title: Your first trade for Friday, April 13
text:
The " Fast Money " traders shared their first moves for the market open.
Tim Seymour was a buyer of United Continental .
Steve Grasso was a buyer of Avis Budget Group .
Dan Nathan was a buyer of Microsoft .
Guy Adami was a buyer of Delta Air lines .
Trader disclosure: On April 12, 2018, the following stocks and commodities mentioned or intended to be mentioned on CNBC's "Fast Money" were owned by the "Fast Money" traders: Tim Seymour is long AMZA, APC, BABA, BAC, BX, C, CCJ, CLF, CMG, CSCO, CX, DAL, DPZ, DVYE, EEM, ERJ, EUFN, EWM, FB, FXI, GE, GILD, GM, GOOGL, HAL, INTC, JD, MAT, MCD, MO, MOS, MPEL, PAK, PHM, PYPL, RAI, RH, RL, SBUX, SQ, T, TIF, TWTR, UA, UAL, VALE, VIAB, VIPS, VOD, VRX, X, XLE, XRT, YNDX, 700.HK. Tim is short IWM, RACE, SPY. Dan Nathan is long SNAP, XLK. Dan bought XLK. Dan sold QQQ, SPY. Steve Grasso is long stock AAPL, BABA, CAR, EVGN, FB, JCP, MJNA, MON, OSTK, PFE, RAD, SQ, T, TWTR, VRX. Grasso owns Callable Trigger contingent yield note linked to SPX, RTY, and MXEA. Grasso's kids own EFA, EFG, EWJ, IJR, SPY. Grasso's firm is long stock AMD, CMG, COTY, CTL, CUBA, DIA, F, GE, GLD, GSK, HPQ, IAU, IBM, ICE, MAT, MJNA, MSFT, NE, QCOM, RIG, SNAP, SNGX, SPY, T, UA, WDR, WHR, XRX, ZNGA. Grasso bought BABA, CAR, FB, OSTK, SQ. Guy Adami is long CELG, EXAS, GDX, INTC. Guy Adami's wife, Linda Snow, works at Merck.
